## Request for Information (RFI) for Federated Health Data Management Service (FHDMS)

**Reference Number:** WS3910412840-Doc3934706048
**Solicitation Number:** WS3910412840
**Publication Date:** March 30, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 15, 2023 2:00 PM EDT

### Amended Terms of Tender
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation must be submitted on May 15, 2023, by 2:00 PM EDT.

### Tender Description
This request for information aims to gather information from industry on new and existing federated health data management solutions to inform the development of a future Statement of Work for the Department of Health (HC). The objectives of this RFI are to:

* Gather information needed to define requirements for a more comprehensive solution
* Understand the current market for FHDMS
* Attract interest from potential suppliers to increase the pool of qualified vendors
* Strengthen relationships between Canada and Industry
* Facilitate the exchange of information between stakeholders while providing an opportunity for all stakeholders to express any concerns prior to further engagement

### Contact Information
If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact Jack Wadas at [jack.wadas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:jack.wadas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Notice URL
The Notice URL is available at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15858608?extsite=MTU4NTg2MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15858608?extsite=MTU4NTg2MDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Government Requirement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Health (HC) is seeking information from industry on new and existing federated health data management solutions. The selected vendor will be expected to provide a comprehensive solution for the management and sharing of health data across different entities. The vendor must demonstrate expertise in providing secure, reliable, and scalable solutions for data management and exchange.
